Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: vscott716
Reviews.Content: I have been to OCMD many times as a kid, and a few times on my own. This was my first time back in 5 yrs. It was our first family vacation with our 2 yr old son. I was a little worried at first since it seemed like such a great location but didn't cost a lot. I was so happy when we got there, its so beautiful! The rooms are just basic, but what else do you need . And they are clean. Your not spending the time in the room, your out. The staff were very nice. We went the week after Labor day & they still had the pool open. The best part was laying in the hammok at night listening to the ocean. This is our new spot. It was perfect for us! Cant wait for our vaca next year.

Reviews.Title: “Paradise!”
Reviews.Author: saramarie1984
Reviews.Content: Best place I've ever stayed at in o.c.m.d.! The location is perfect with the landscape and closeness of the boardwalk. Its an older motel, but it gives it that old style beach motel feeling. The bay view is gorgeous and tons of places to fish along with the neat pier. I will be back again in the future to use this motel and will be recommending this place to others!

Reviews.Title: “Fun Fun Fun”
Reviews.Author: Bonny W
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the Oceanic for many years, I come with my family and with friends. It is great for families due the closeness of all of the OC attractions. It is perfect for friends who want to have fun....Leave the car and bus it....all of the hot spots are within a few minutes, or a short walk.... This place is a money saver for families, how many places can you stay within OC and cookout...thats what we do...save a few bucks on dinner and then hit the boardwalk for fun. The staff is excellent, Joyce and Angie do everything possible to make your stay great. You just can not beat this place...

Reviews.Title: “Serene Quiet Escape!”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer B
Reviews.Content: This hotel is NOT a fancy tourist stop but rather a small quiet secret. Most guests are return customers. There are refrigerators but no microwave in the room. The office is open 24 hours and they have coffee and microwave for you use. Some rooms are small but clean. The staff is friendly and helpful. The pool is clean and mostly used by adults. There are few families with small children but not crowds of them. There is a fishing pier you can go to for free, This place is great for doing nothing but reading, swimming, fishing and relaxing! Check the website for the room you would like. We had on on the bayside and it was small but VERY quiet as it is on the back side of the building so no traffic sounds just the sounds of the waves and the view of the fishing pier.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome atmosphere! Definetly coming back :)”
Reviews.Author: ifallelsefails5
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 days at the of august. This place is great. Great staff very friendly, free coffee all day free fruit and newspaper for breakfast and free passes to the pier. The view alone is enough of a reason to stay here everything else is just a bonus. Love all the beach chairs, charcoal grills, and hammocks, a lot of fun :) rooms were small but cozy.

Reviews.Title: “no reason to stay anywhere else...”
Reviews.Author: Donna B
Reviews.Content: Recently came to MD to be in a wedding... from the wedding, we came to Oceanic motel to finish the week. Ended up part of the wedding party and the bride and groom showed up... The hotel was so accommodating, we couldn't have asked for a better "honeymoon" for our family!!! Depending on what you want to do, you won't even have to get back into your car if you don't have to. The pool overlooking the bay is awesome... I see ABSOLUTELY NO REASON for us to EVER stay anywhere else, can't wait to book our next stay....

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME TIME”
Reviews.Author: Karen B
Reviews.Content: Just had to write a review, i usually don't take the time. This is the first time I stayed in Oceanic and I loved it. Right near the fishing pier,(grandson's favorite part) and it is free to fish just rent the pole. Room was perfect Older but clean. Pool was nice.Motel is close to Inlet-water, tram,boardwalk,carnival everything you come to OC for. The Staff was AMAZING!!!!!!!!! Angie is so sweet, she is willing to inform you of all activities going on and always has a smile. Bam-Bam was great he is the maitenance man I believe. It is not real fancy but it is nice and a great family place. This will be my motel of chioce from now on. Looking forward to seeing you all again soon. Hugs from VA. Karen B

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to been coming for 10 years!”
Reviews.Author: ajones5708
Reviews.Content: Angie is a wonderful help. She is always willing to go the extra mile to make sure you have everything you need. Bev is a wonderful housekeeper. She has a great personalilty and is very personalable. Bev will make you smile anyway she can. I love having her as my housekeeper every year. Joyce is so nice. Always has a smile on her face. My overall time that Im there is great. I never wanna leave there and cant wait to return the next year! Thank you Oceanic staff for making our stay so enjoyable and fun!

Reviews.Title: “I will definately return!”
Reviews.Author: Shawn B
Reviews.Content: My experience was great! The room was clean and very roomy. The staff were friendly and informative of events and info about the town. The location is great, close to bus stop and inlet shopping, very short walk to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “We'll definitely go back!”
Reviews.Author: Kim H
Reviews.Content: The Oceanic Motel is a very nice place in a perfect location. Served our purposed perfectly and everyone was very friendly. The rooms are not huge, but that's not what we went for. It was big enough for us and it appeared that the bathroom had recently had some work done. Wallpaper looked new and shower, sink etc. were nothing like described in some other reviews I've read. You can't beat it for the price. The location couldn't be better, especially if you're travelling with teenagers.

Reviews.Title: “tAKING PEOPLES MONEY AND DONT EVEN GET THE ROOM THIS IS SO WRONG, PEOPLE BEWARE!”
Reviews.Author: K S
Reviews.Content: Taking peoples money n not even getting the room! This is not how to do business and it will be reported. Then saying they owe more for a room they didnt even get, reservation was made the same day, only to get down there n be told theres a problem with the whole thing, not getting the room and still charging for it, which was already booked up!

Reviews.Title: “Only nice if they get your money...”
Reviews.Author: OhioValleyGirl028
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the oceanic last year and we had not one bad thing to say about it. This year however we booked the room and our plans changed so I called and cancelled with no hassek and friendly service and was told my money would be back in the account in 2-3 days. Great! Only problem is today is day 6 and I have yet to have any money returned. I called today to see what the problem was and Tamara told me its not their problem its my bank, along with an unsightly attitude that my mom could here on the other side of the room, and the constant fact that she would talk over me repeatedly and not let me speak. After I got a word in I told her that if I did not have the money by the end of the week I would be filing an unauthorization form against the company. She then proceeded to say it could take anywhere from 7-30+ days she didnt know. So i guess Ive learned the only time you can get good service is if you follow through with your money not take it back. Safe to say tis is last time we will ever consider this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “It serves it's purpose”
Reviews.Author: Bill S
Reviews.Content: The motel is very old. New mattresses and linen is needed, but the location and the rates are reasonable. The only major problem I had was the shower water changed from very hot to very cold throughout my shower. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. Whth staying here they have discounts for different restaurants. If I go back to O.C. next year i probably will stay here again, but get a bigger room.

Reviews.Title: “Oceanic Motel, Ocean City M.D.”
Reviews.Author: Brianna1695
Reviews.Content: Our stay was very pleasant, the people that worked the front desk were very accomodating and nice. The outside of the building is in need of repair, but although outdated, the room we stayed in was clean and served its purpose. The view was beautiful and the boardwalk was only a few blocks away. We had spent a night at the Americana hotel, right on the beach and paid over 200 dollars for a place that was not clean and an uncomfortable place to stay. We even discovered cockroaches under the sink! The Oceanic Motel was a welcome change from the horrid conditions at the Americana and the price was only $129. The pool was spotless and a nice break from the heat. We will enjoy staying again.

Reviews.Title: “terrible”
Reviews.Author: Vera47_11
Reviews.Content: Old construction , updates and repairs never made. Cleaning had been done but one cannot see the difference before and after. Bath tub rusted through, linoleum is old and curved on sides, short many inches to the edges. Old small fridges which had bad odor. Bed linens and towels are old, blankets with holes. Maids are using old vacuum cleaners, scooping garbage out of them with their hands. Also, hotel recommending restaurants in the area -tried "Frog" across the street, horrible!

Reviews.Title: “Pros outweigh the cons”
Reviews.Author: Deanna J
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great price. Our door opened to the bay with a beautiful beach area. Great location for walking to the boardwalk. Free paper, coffee, oranges and bananas. Always found a parking spot. Cons: Room was filthy. Blinds were broken, dusty and stuck half open. Bed was so old you rolled toward the center. Bathroom was so small you had to put your butt against the wall to bend over into the sink. In summary we looked past the filth for the price and location.

Reviews.Title: “oceanic”
Reviews.Author: boopboop22
Reviews.Content: another yr at the oceanic the place is a great place to stay everyone is so nice and friendly walking distance to the beach and boardwalk this is my 21 yrs staying here will be back next yr

Reviews.Title: “Great family Motel”
Reviews.Author: Steve M
Reviews.Content: .We have been staying here at least 2-3 times a year for about 10 years and love the place!!! The staff is very helpful and friendly, always fresh coffee in the office and fruit in the mornings. Beautiful view of the inlet, bay and Assateague Island. You can relax in a hammock, read a book by the pool or spend the day fishing right in front of your room. The beach and boardwalk are right across the street but yet is still very quiet and relaxing. There are Jet Ski rentals, Para sailing, and the fishing pier (which is free to Motel guest with a pass you get in the office) directly behind the Motel. No the rooms are not modern but have a more rustic decor that fits the older building. We have had groups of up to 4 rooms with family and friends and they have all enjoyed there stays there. I know we will be coming back for many more years!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Dangerous!”
Reviews.Author: tarap2480
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in my share of shore motels, but this one is by far the worst. I can't imagine that is even up to code: no GFCI outlets in bathroom, chipping paint, floor tiles coming up from shower, drop ceiling tiles coming down in bathroom, rotten door frame that made lock jam, the list goes on and on. I did learn a valuable lesson though, from now on I will ask to see any hotel room before paying the remaining balance. We typically do not spend much time in the room while visiting the beach. We do expect basic amenities when we are there such as a clean, fully operational shower. Being scalded in the middle of taking a shower is not acceptable to me. This is a dangerous situation especially for children! Ocean City has an excellent transportation system. I suggest you stay somewhere else and take the bus to the inlet.

Reviews.Title: “Great Find!”
Reviews.Author: JMiller19
Reviews.Content: We stayed here July 5 through July 8. I was a little nervous about how the hotel was going to be even after reading some of the reviews, but I was not disappointed. Overall you get what you pay for - this isn't a high end hotel, but you're not paying a high end price. The room is dated, older bed, window air conditioners, small sink and bathroom area, but hey, who comes to the beach to stay in the room? The room was very clean, the staff were very helpful and pleasant. They even let us check in like 2 hours early! It's a great location, close to the board walk, and it's very quiet at night. Definitely would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “only place to stay in ocean city”
Reviews.Author: anna p
Reviews.Content: This place is awesome!! Fantastic views, extremely friendy and helpful staff. We stayed over the 4th of July and watched fireworks by the pool, didn't have to go to boardwalk to see them. Never had to move our car. Boardwalk across the street , small private beach, grills a plenty and very pretty setting. Rooms are very clean. This is our 6th year here with a lot more to come.

Reviews.Title: “An absolute place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Lisafloyd
Reviews.Content: We stayed from June 23 rd to July 2 nd. We loved it! The rooms were clean, the staff is very friendly and courteous. Easy to walk to the Boardwalk, easy for fishing, beach like section has lounge area and hammoks,. I recommend this place highly, very reasonably priced. Had one small problem with the shower but staff fixed it so quikly I was amazed. My next vacation will be here. We are planning on staying a few days in September. I also had the honor to help tag Horseshoe crabs. I loved the experience and learned so many things about these gentility creatures. Thank you Mr. Arnold. And thank you Oceanic Motel for making it possible.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay and scenery is awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: odenkai
Reviews.Content: The staff here is wonderful and you have the best location to the boardwalk and best view of the bay and ocean. Got to the opportunity to learn about horseshoe crabs and their meaning. Helped tag them by catching them with my family and others.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: Clint B
Reviews.Content: First time staying here will definetly be back.Staff was very friendly,even at the fishing pier! The rides and boardwalk are only a block away.Came for the fishing,boats are only a few blocks or the pier is right there,we fished all night.not a 4 star motel but we didn't pay a 4 star price.Had money to do what we wanted,who goes to the beach and stays in there room all day anyway?

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place”
Reviews.Author: Monroe7139
Reviews.Content: This is the second year in a row that I've stayed at the Oceanic. Yes the motel is a little outdated but it is very clean and for the price of the rooms you shouldn't expect the Hilton. Overall great location & staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: mzjodee
Reviews.Content: Great Location, Rooms not so great but clean. Definatly will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Rugged room that we barely stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Bajoba
Reviews.Content: Get here before the real estate market flips & they sell to make a $90MM resort. The Morrison family aparently own the Southern tip of OC, MD across from Assateaque at the inlet. Room are rustic, location is great, free access to fishing pier. Pool was immaculate. Fridge worked, bed was older.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location , but a NASTY ROOM!!!!”
Reviews.Author: vanessa a
Reviews.Content: STAYED from MAY 25th - MAY 28th 2012!!! This was my first time coming down to Ocean City, MD along with my boyfriend. We were so excited about the location of the place, because it was very close to the boardwalk, Jetski's and the beach. When we first arrived, the staff was very helpful & friendly. Especially since we arrived 3 hrs later than the check in time due to heavy traffic for Memorial Day weekend.When we first walked into our room it had such a BAD MOLDY SMELL that my allergies started acting up immediately!! The room also had another weird smell to it that was to be discovered LATER ON!!! We had to make due with the room since we couldnt get our money back!!! The carpet had stains on it, the bathroom was very small,and the smell was just overbearing. I ended up going to the nearest Rite Aid to buy a can of Febreeze and two Glade Candles just to try and make the room smell some what better!!! The 2nd day of our stay we noticed that even with all the air freshner and the candles lite while we were there, we couldnt get the stench out of the room, so we decided to investigate the room. We found an OLD MCDONALDS bag full of food under the bed, and molded pieces of captain crunch cereal. I was just so disgusted that I didnt even want to be in the room anymore. I stayed majority of the time trying to freshen up the room for the night.The kicker that really turned me off of this place was when House Keeping came into our room and said to me" Oh wow the room smells good, what did you do to make the room smell better!!!!" The room really affected our stay there and took away from some of the bonuses The Oceanic brings. I really liked the location and being so close to the beach, Jetski's, and boardwalk. I was glad to have a pool nearby incase we didnt want to be at the beach for hours at a time. Being as though the place had No Vacancy you know they are making money so I dont understand why the rooms look and smell the way that they do!!! It would be nice if they updated the rooms, with some paint, and new carpets, and make them smell better!!!! ONE thing for sure is I wont be staying here again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Place”
Reviews.Author: charlieboy033
Reviews.Content: We have been staying here for years, always off season. You just can't beat it. Rooms are very small, but clean. Staff is great, especially the owner. We enjoy their beach in the back. Off season it is so peaceful, loads of birds, beautiful sunsets, picnic tables, grills. We just paid $34 night, up to May 16, what a deal. Just don;t be expecting frills, it's just basic, but unique, a little hidden treasure at the south end of OC

Reviews.Title: “Nice location”
Reviews.Author: jf49
Reviews.Content: Kids love it, near all attractions, boardwalk ect. Good for a night or two, but old and a little rough around the edges!! Not bad for the money in OC, but if you want quality go elsewhere!!

Reviews.Title: “worst ever”
Reviews.Author: traveler136
Reviews.Content: I dont understand how this is a 4 star rating...I would give it a "0".

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING”
Reviews.Author: kaila n
Reviews.Content: So last year me and my entire fire department decided to go to ocean city for firemens convention. Oceanic had the best prices as well as the best location and the view is amazing. The front desk lady was a little mean but you would be too if you had to sit there all day and listen to people complain. Our housekeeper was such a doll, and took very good care of us. this has got to be one of the best hotels in oc. you may go and pay 300 dollars a night for the hilton or something but when you stay here your not going to pay that or even half of that nor will you feel as if you are even in a hotel. Well june is coming up fast and me and my dept have already booked our rooms for this year and yes in fact it is at the oceanic. Thanks Oceanic Motel for giving us a great place to lay our heads at night

Reviews.Title: “Great location-but needs remodel”
Reviews.Author: Janelle M
Reviews.Content: This hotel I chose for a last minute weekend to OCMD. The hotel has a great location right on the inlet. close walk to the beach and to the boardwalk. The rooms needed major upgrade and were small. Staff in the office were very friendly. We arrived late at night and she waited for us to check in...after 11pm! Good place if you arent spending time in your room.

Reviews.Title: “reasonable priced and clean”
Reviews.Author: lisa b f
Reviews.Content: my husband and i have bin staying here for years we love its location is everything your a hop skip and jump from swimming , fishing, boating, and assateague iland , its clean and coffee and fruit every day. joice and angie, the managers are nice and friendly verry reasonable priced with a verry nice pool if u dont want to do the sand thing bob and lisa

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: NicePlace8993
Reviews.Content: This was mine and my husbands second time staying here and we like this place. Everyone in the office is very nice. We had a great view the rooms was nice. The price for the place is GREAT..

Reviews.Title: “Coolest place on earth!”
Reviews.Author: Splash W
Reviews.Content: This motel is the best in oc, i didn't want to let it out and keep it for ourselves, but the reviews are needed, i feel like i am on a yacht without the motion, it's a very quaint?, cozy place ,that made me and Denise feel like we were on a honeymoon all over again, I would never stay at any other place in oc now, we have been in other supposedly more expensive places and were not as happy as at the oceanic!, I love this place so much i want to move there even if i had to work there to get started;), the staff and all are like family, I love the water being that close it inspires me to write music, i could never get that at any other motel, .. , this place is great the way it is..this is the way i dreamed of staying at ocean city since i was a kid, I've been to hawaii, at huge motels and this was way more fun.. pier fishing, jets ski's rental on site at pier next door, wow, "John and Denise K

Reviews.Title: “Perfect motel for a beach vacation”
Reviews.Author: roberto c
Reviews.Content: When visiting Ocean City I always stay at this motel for the following reasons: near to restaurant; excellent view of the beach and the bay; friendly staff; always clean; fishing pier next door; rooms have the basic amenities needed in a motel; safety; grills are available for the guests; and pool on site. I hope this place never change its status from a basic motel to a very expensive beach hotel as most places near to the beach. I always take advantage of the "guests appreciation" special in which the rates are very reasonable. Thanks to Joyce and her staff for the great service and for keeping this affordable place available to the public. I love it. Roberto DC

Reviews.Title: “Wish we had found this years ago!”
Reviews.Author: Nancy and Larry W
Reviews.Content: We just stayed our 8th time since June of this year! That should tell you something. If you love OC for what it's about this is the place for you. Sun rise, sun set, you have them both. Like to fish? You have the ocean, inlet and bay right there. Watch the dolphins? Be within walking distance of everything fun? This is the place! Joyce has the undieing respect of her team. Each and every one of them has a smile and wants you to have the stay you desire. From the nightshift lady who always has a smile with that first "free" cup of coffee & fruit, to Angie and the girls (yes trouble your one of the girls) for the 2nd and third. Beverly and her co-horts in house keeping that give you that "family" feel that makes you comfortable. And they don't just stay in the office waiting for you to go to them, they walk around and ASK you how your doing and really mean it. The gounds and rooms are always clean and well maintained (you have to take into consideration how old the buildings are and then turn over of guest). We'd like to keep this treasure to our selves but, it's just to darn great. They have a web cam that you can check out but they may want to have a link on their web site. We just left and I'm missing them already. :-(

Reviews.Title: “The BEST in OC!”
Reviews.Author: Hamilton1998
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed staying at the Oceanic for years and plan to stay there for years to come. Everyone in our large group enjoys the friendly, welcoming staff who are always attentive to our needs. While enjoying the best scenic views in Ocean City with the freedom to fish & cookout on the beach - watching the boats come and go out to sea, also watching the wild horses on Assateague Island. The rooms are small but I don't go to Ocean City to stay in the room and since we go the same time every year we have become friends with other returning guests who feel the same as we do. If you want to relax and unwind, park your car and be within walking distance of the boardwalk while enjoying peace & quiet this is the place.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here every year”
Reviews.Author: chris g
Reviews.Content: We stay here every because of it's location. Close to the beach and fishing on the side or you can get a free pass for the pier. People that stay there are ones who should enjoy the surroundings and not stay in their rooms to watch tv all day. Remember your on vacation. The staff is great and meet all your needs anytime of the day. I've stayed here the last six years and plan on booking here till the place washes away. I can fish all day and my wife and son can go to the beach or pool then we meet up and go to the boardwalk which is only a block away. It's the oceanic not the Hilton in Vegas. That's the way i want it to stay. Great place to stay and won't book any where else.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, friendly .... LOVE IT HERE!”
Reviews.Author: DDiamondgirl55
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd time my husband & I stqyed at the Oceanic. We love it here. Staff is friendly and rooms are basic, but clean & comfortable. Location is excellent. No need to move the car at all. One block to beach, boardwalk, restaurants & shops. Pool on-site and fishing pier next door. Beautiful views of West OC, Assateague & harbor. Watch the boats, wave runners, inlet, ocean and just relax. Smoking rooms available which is a rarity in OC!

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE! Read before you buy!!!”
Reviews.Author: greyphoenixx
Reviews.Content: I had read the reviews on here and I saw alot of good and alot of bad. I went against my best judgement and booked the hotel through travelocity. Let me say, it may vary by room type, because the pictures of the family rooms look nice, but we got a Ocean View Queen room. It WAS DISGUSTING! We were there a total of 3 hours and decided to leave. Our daughter got sick from the mold and paint chips in the room. First off, it took like 30 minutes just to get us in our room, even though it was well after 3pm....which is checkin and the reason? They hadnt cleaned it since the last person checked out. Also noticed the 'fresh fruit' that they served for breakfast was sitting out, in no air conditioning with bugs all over it...not appealing at all. When we got to the room and opened the door I about died. Dirty and ripped up comforter.....room so small we had to turn sideways to walk through to the even smaller bathroom. The TV was on...so the cleaning person was watching some soaps while they were "cleaning". Found their sponge left in the bathroom, which was completely CLEAN! There was a rusty shelf below the sink that was barely holding with one screw in it. The shower curtain rod? PVC !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! How trailor trash??? There was visible mold all over the bathroom and in corners of the bedroom. You could smell it as well. Paint was chipping all along the edges of the room. And when I took a quick shower the word "Boo" was on the mirror. So did they clean? Hm. I don't think so. Just overall craphole. And good luck getting a refund if you booked it through a travel agent. The "manager" on duty, whose name is on the wall in the office who checked us in, lied and said she wasn't a manager to the travel agent. She said she didn't know when the manager would be in, and this went on for a week and a half. They finally got ahold of the manager and they are now giving us a refund for the two nights we didn't stay.

Reviews.Title: “OMG I should have gone with my gut instinct”
Reviews.Author: tib3322
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 8/17 - 8/21. Let me just say that if we could have afforded to blow our budget, we would have checked out moments after checking in. however, it seemed that every other reasonable place that we called was booked, and we didn't want to spend all of our money to get an expensive room, so we were stuck. let me say that as soon as we opened the door to room #55, i felt the tears in my eyes. one of the walls was dirty and had a hole, and the cheap wallboard was bowed. the carpet was quite worn and didn't look clean. i wouldn't even think about hanging anything in the nasty closet, and i didn't take a thing out of my suitcase - i didn't want to put my good things in the dresser. i stepped foot in the bathroom and that's when things got worse. the sink was falling off of the wall. the shower stall - well let's just say i ran out to cvs to buy flip flops. the floor of the stall was dirty - it was much darker than the rest of the stall. the floor was worn and cracking. i could go on and on here. when we closed the door, my boyfriend said "wow, look, there's a fly swatter." I never got that with a room before!!! Amazingly, we didn't have to use it. Still... The next morning in the shower I noticed a sagging tile. At that point it didnt surprise me and I didn't think much of it until later, when my boyfriend was in the shower. I heard him say "what the heck, am i chicken little?" the tile broke and fell on his head. we placed the chunk of tile on the bathroom sink. it was still sitting there 2 days later. gee, they did come and put a new tile up. My mood wasn't right the whole time of the vacation because of the room. After talking to other guests and to people in town, my boyfriend went to the front desk and spoke with the manager. Long story short, my card was refunded in full for 3 of the 4 nights that we stayed. That did improve my opinion of the hotel, but, I still wouldn't recommend it to anybody. It's a shame, because it does have a great location at the end of the boardwalk, where most of the fun stuff is. Plus, the pool was actually very nice. You can rent jet skis right next door. Another con was the parking. It is pretty limited, and people using the fishing pier can park in the hotel lot. So, don't count on being able to get a spot if you head out. We came back one night and everything was filled up. The girl at the desk gave us the okay to park in a no parking zone by the pool. At that point, i think they were catering to us. I was really sad with this hotel experience. i do a lot of research before choosing a hotel, and this was no exception. I read the reviews on here and on other sites. While I did see that there were bad reviews for the Oceanic, I saw that they were all pretty much older reviews. I figured okay, they must have improved things, great. NOT THE CASE FROM WHAT I SAW!!!! A coworker of mine spent time at the same hotel last month. She said it was clean and it was fine. After i made my reservation, i got second thoughts, but after hearing her opinion, I stuck with it. Mistake!!!! I should have trusted my gut and cancelled things right away. I won't complain about the size or the dated decor of the place. I could care less how big or small the room is, or if the furniture is pretty. I just want a clean room, where I can get a good night of sleep, and a nice shower. From previous experience, I know not to expect Hilton-type quality in a shore hotel. Still, this hotel's standard was far below anything that i have previously experienced.

Reviews.Title: “"we loved it and we'll be back!"”
Reviews.Author: GinnyMohntonPa
Reviews.Content: We love the oceanic Motel the staff is very friendly and they treat you like family - the Motel has the best view in Ocean City Md they have the bay and the inlet - the rooms are lovely and they just redid the back of the motel it is very nice - you step out of your room on the sand -- They go out of there way to make your stay wonderful

Reviews.Title: “everybody was very nice and wil will be back.”
Reviews.Author: globug4
Reviews.Content: everybody was nice and we had such a wonderful time. we have stay a this motel for a good many year and we will use this motel from now on and the people are very nice in the office and the cleaning people. will returned next year. thanks gloria j poff

Reviews.Title: “Always fun and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey H
Reviews.Content: A small, intimate hotel with a lovely location and a very friendly and courteous and accomadating staff. Very close to a lot of things to do in Ocean City. Gorgeous location at the Ocean City Inlet with water on two sides.

Reviews.Title: “EWWW!”
Reviews.Author: caslup
Reviews.Content: stayed here with my husband, and my sisters family for a 5 nights. was under the impression a communicating room was well, a communicating room. No. Just one room, with a "seperate" living area and pull out couch. At first glance, room was okay. Pull out the sleeper sofa, everything goes down hill. No place to walk around, bugs smashed on walls and ceiling, room didn't get serviced on one of the days. had to ask for new towels. didn't have enough blankets for pull out sofa. The best thing in the room was the mini fridge - at least it wasn't ancient. Place was filthy and disgusting. apparently everyone in OC knows the Oceanic doesn't enforce parking. Don't leave in your vehicle and expect to come back to find a space. Staff "can't" do anything about it. I'd rather sleep in my car in a parking lot (hey, I'll just use theirs!) than pay to stay here. EWWW!!!!

Reviews.Title: “"Staff Is Great"”
Reviews.Author: mikesroadhouse
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Oceanic last couple of years during Bike Week. For a motel it's great and close to everything you need. Plenty of parking. The staff is very friendly and will take care of anything you need without an attitude. I wish it was open during the St. Paddy's weekend festivities. Will be there in Sept. again. Mikesroadhouse

Reviews.Title: “Hesitant but happy : )”
Reviews.Author: kenwarnecka
Reviews.Content: My money this yr was super tight ,so i was looking for and inexspensive room on internet. as i looked several popped up but i chose oceanic because of its location and price.( almost half the price of other motels ). i was hesitant to book all 5 days in fear of ending up in a rathole because of reviews i had read .upon arrival i checked in talked to half a dozen people already there . not one person had a bad thing to say other than the rooms were a lil small. i went to front desk and spoke to angie about the other 4 days , she said she would get right back to me . just as she promised within and hour she was back to me with 4 more nites. the motel staff was very friendly and helpful ! there were grills for cooking outside . and if you like to fish you are in the right place . you have a great view of ocean from one side assateague from other . the place is older but the staff has done a GREAT job fixing up ! the boardwalk ,anything you need is within walking distance. Didnt move my truck all week ! spent alot of time in pool because ocean was super rough !!!!! pool was well taken care of and super clean ! well thanks guys see you next year ! KW

Reviews.Title: “Great location but horrible room!”
Reviews.Author: EastCoastGal14
Reviews.Content: After the oceanic motel was recommended to us from a co-worker I decided to book it for our weekend summer vacation. The motel was in a great location as it was in walking distance from the beach, boardwalk, and jet skiing. It had great views and you could see Assateague island and the wild ponies. However, as soon as I walked into the room I wished I could get a refund. The room was outdated, small, and dank. There were stains on the chair and in the bathroom. We stayed Thursday-Sunday. Our room was never cleaned on Friday and so I had to go to the front desk to get clean towels. If you're staying here make sure you bring plenty of socks and shower flip flops because you never want to walk without anything covering your feet.

Reviews.Title: “We''ll be back in July 2012!!”
Reviews.Author: sarg473
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Oceanic Motel was great as usual. We have been staying here for 12 years. The staff is always friendly, helpful and always makes sure you have what you need, The pool is very nice and always clean. The motel itself is a very comfortable and relaxing place to stay. The location is great too. You don't even need to move your car. Everything is in walking distance. We always enjoy our stay here and we will be back again next summer for sure! Thank you to all of the staff at the Oceanic Motel!!

Reviews.Title: “Epic location, amazing views, incredible price.”
Reviews.Author: Drummermanryan
Reviews.Content: The view was absolutely amazing at this motel. If you go, we would recommend a bay view room. Everything was so close, but it was far enough away that you couldn't hear all the noise. Even though everyone says the rooms are small, those people have obviously never lived in a dorm for a year. For college kids like my girlfriend and I, it was pretty spacious. The price is unbeatable and the rooms were clean. We will definitely be back for guest appreciation week. Only downside is that for some reason the pool closes after dark...bummer. But if that's the only downside we can find then $150 a night for peak season right behind the peir is an amazing deal.

Reviews.Title: “Cleaning people steal money!”
Reviews.Author: tif5214
Reviews.Content: Cleaning people stole $200 out of my purse & $80 off my friend when we had a do not disturb sign on the door!

Reviews.Title: “We enjoy it and plan to return in August.”
Reviews.Author: ali706390
Reviews.Content: Improvement on bayside beach looks great! Staff has always been kind, friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “we love the place i been staying here for 20 yrs love it”
Reviews.Author: boopboop22
Reviews.Content: i just love it here we can park the car and walk to wearever we want to go

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location & Staff”
Reviews.Author: vacationonceayear
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to this motel since I can remember (around the age of 5) I am now in my early 20's and I keep coming back for more. I couldn't ask for a better location (where the bay and inlet meet). There is fresh coffee and fruit every morning. A gorgeous view of the water and an awesome peir! Ski do's at a discounted price if your staying at their motel. Basically everything you want and need to do is located with in walking distance. And even if it's not within walking distance the bus station is only one street up and will take you where ever you need to go. The staff is amazing! We tried to check in early and our room wasn't ready so they let us park our vehicle there while we spent the day at the beach and we could even use their pool before we checked in. That is very thoughtful because parking gets very expensive down there. So that saved us the extra money! Thank you oceanic! We will be seeing you once again next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay! Can't wait to come back!!”
Reviews.Author: kitneraj
Reviews.Content: I found the Oceanic Motel when I searched the internet for "ocean front hotels in ocmd" and this was PERFECT for us. The rooms are a bit small, but the staff was so friendly and helpful. We locked ourselves out and had no trouble getting help to get in. We also cooked out on the grills they have at the hotel and the wonderful maintenance was kind enough to let us borrow a flipper! My husband was able to fish the inlet and also the Oceanic Pier free of charge. Overall, it was fantastic! We can't wait to go back in the off season for their "Guest Appreciation" special dates!

Reviews.Title: “Greatest Spot in Ocean City!!!!”
Reviews.Author: fisherman222
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely the most fun place to stay in Ocean City. The management is so friendly and helpful. You will meet the nicest people in that office. The rooms may be small and the building old but the location has anything else in O.C. beat by miles. You can park you car and never have to get back in it until you leave. You are in walking distance to the beach and boardwalk and if you want to fish, just open your door and cast into the inlet or bay. This is one of the greatest places to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable, pleasant stay.”
Reviews.Author: caveman987
Reviews.Content: Great location, great price. Rooms are for sleeping and cleaning up after tons of fun at the beach.... If you plan on being out and about this place is perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Very affordable”
Reviews.Author: Muskymaniac
Reviews.Content: Great location perfect for budget minded people. This is not a luxury motel but for a bed ac pool and location it's perfect! Well will definatly book again

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Monroe7139
Reviews.Content: I wasn't too sure what to expect from this place after reading mixed reviews. We stayed from July 14th - July 18th. The room was small and in need of some remodeling but overall was fine for the price. It was very clean when we arrived there were no bugs or foul smells like I've read in reviews. My room was cleaned daily by a very nice maid who made sure we had everything we needed. It's only steps away from dining and the beach so it was nice not having to drive all around O.C. The view from the hotel is beautiful. It was also nice to go out to the small private beach at night and watch all the horseshoe crabs come onto the shore. I'll definitely come back to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Long Nights and Pleasant Days!”
Reviews.Author: BarefootBay
Reviews.Content: Although the room wasn't enormous (the table was in the closet) I really loved this place. The staff were very helpful and seemed to care about doing a good job. The location was ideal, right next to Trimpers Rides, several bars, and just a few blocks away from the small area I refer to as the ethnic district, where the shops arent just the usual tourist traps, there are nice shady trees along the sidewalks, and they actually offer a rather diverse selection of neat stuff. Furthermore, the Oceanic has its own beach with palms trees, hammocks and grills - what else can you ask for?!

Reviews.Title: “What a great location!!! Friendly mgmt, nice pool...”
Reviews.Author: RockguyNewYork
Reviews.Content: July 11 & 12, 2011 - Also stayed here several years ago. Motel is located on the edge of the Ocean City Inlet. Desk clerk Signe offered us keys to rooms to look at before we checked in. Very small rooms, old place, but all you need in an atmosphere like that. We just used it for sleeping and washing up. Didn't see any bugs! Jet Ski's tour available next door, Harrison's Restaurant across the street, the boardwalk is across the street, and the ocean beach is right there. They offer free coffee around the clock! What more could you ask for? The room we had cost us $109 per night. Agnes was helpful, and we had a long chat, while enjoying their pool, with "Craig", the groundskeeper, a real nice guy!

Reviews.Title: “Great for Families”
Reviews.Author: ManassasPam
Reviews.Content: This is a great motel for families. Lots to do for the whole family within walking distance, seadoo, parasail, amusement park, fishing, right on the water with no boardwalk crowding. If you are not looking for the Ritz this is the place. Friendly and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, price, and staff, awesomee place”
Reviews.Author: Kenking1120
Reviews.Content: We stayed here june 18-22, we had no idea what to expect, so we get there and its a nice decent place we werent expecting a 5 star place, tried to check in early but our room wasnt ready yet, but that was fine since the boardwalk is literally right next door, so we walked around n got a feel for the area, we finally were able to check in, and got to our room, now the rooms are small but it was perfect for 2 of us, we were on the inlet side, right outside of our room was a little manmade beach, not good for lounging in the sun but it was fun to go out n see all the horshoe crabs and other creatures, everynight the beach would fill up with thousands of horseshoe crabs (it was mating season) that was fun! The staff is amazing anything u need they help u with, fannie the maid was awesome she had us laughing every morning, she really is a riot. But honestly if u wanna b in a good location n not pay 100s of dollrs to b on the boardwalk, this is the place, everything u need is within walking distance. We will be returning in oct. With some friends so we will b getting a bigger room! Cant wait i love love loved this place!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to get back there next summer!”
Reviews.Author: beachb0und3
Reviews.Content: My husband found this Motel listed on the Internet as he made a search for a place with fishing nearby. We couldn't have imagined a better place. He was able to fish right out in front of the Oceanic during the fishing hours permitted. He was in heaven, needless to say. We absolutely loved the location - - walking distance to everything - - and the staff was so friendly there. We will most definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Ocean City spring car show”
Reviews.Author: tswift01
Reviews.Content: This is the 12th year we stayed with Joyce and her great team at the Oceanic and will certainly be back. You cant ask for a better location to watch the boats going in and out of the ocean and all of the cars going in and out of the inlet parking lot. We can't wait until October for the Corvette show and will have to sneak a trip down to do some fishing too.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect setting and location in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: KatieDid6
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have gotten used to staying in Villas and in 4 or 5 star resorts with our TimeShare. Oceanic Motel is NOT a 4 or 5 star resort....however....what it is, is quaint, quirky, older, clean, and quiet (especially for it's location!), has great, helpful owners and staff, and it's own devoted, fun and endearing return clientel...us included! The Oceanic is located at the far southern end of Ocean City - it's "prime location" sitting directly along the Inlet and the Bayside - we absolutely love the location. We park the car and almost never use it - we walk everywhere! We usually stay in a small room (YES, it IS small!) overlooking the Bay...(overlooking the inlet is nice too)...you arn't getting luxury here folks...what you are getting is pure ambiance! Oceanic has a "tropical feeling" with it's sandy beach area with palm trees, chairs, picnic tables, and hammocks :) overlooking the Bay and the Inlet. At night, the waves lapping up on the beach (or the loud airconditioner!) put you to sleep....and in the morning, the seagulls wake you up! The pool has rarely been crowded when we have been there, and it is always clean, good location, and sits directly overlooking the Bay and the Jetski Rentals...great fun to watch! The OC Boardwalk is a few steps away...literally, now that the boardwalk has been extended all the way down the Inlet, you have direct access, right from the Oceanic parking lot! Our favorite restaurants to walk to are MR Ducks, Angler, Marina Deck and Fishtails...and of course, anything on the Boardwalk!

Reviews.Title: “WE'LL BE BACK”
Reviews.Author: pooh065
Reviews.Content: It Is a great place stay and the staff terrific it is the only place i will stay when i go to oc md i visit every may and october joyce is the best mrg ever always has a smile on her face no matter what time of day, evening, and night it maybe.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE IT”
Reviews.Author: 2hearts
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Oceanic Motel for years now. We love it won't stay anywhere else my Husband loves the fishing pier and the staff are the greatest the view is too this is the place to stay if you go to OC MD

Reviews.Title: “A piece of Heaven for motorcyclist”
Reviews.Author: LuminousCSWS
Reviews.Content: The motel has a great location this will be 3 year coming with my motorcycle club Cant Stop Wont Stop. You don't have to move your car for anything the boardwalk is just across the street. Joyce the owner is a wonderful person and she was attentive to our needs. The cleaning staff was on point with our room. The place is a good spot for motorcylist. Joyce loves bikes and doesn't mind the noise at all. The spot is great for fishing but please have a fishing license, if not you will catch a ticket from local PD. Please bring alot sunblock for the day and a sweater for the night. I can't wait to come back with more people next year.

Reviews.Title: “fun and friendly place to stay”
Reviews.Author: somersvilleducklady
Reviews.Content: we just arrived back from our memorial day getaway,. this was one of the most relaxing and fun times we had in ocean city, md. the hotel was far enough away from the crowds but close enough for the beach, fishing , and boardwalk activities. great place to stay and a affordable value, the rooms were dated but kept clean, the staff was extriordinary helpful and friendly, they all deserve a big thank you for making us feel special for staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Cant Stop Wont Stop MC loves the oceanic motel”
Reviews.Author: gamblevp
Reviews.Content: This motel stands out from the rest. Its on the end of the boardwalk which makes it perfect for starting your stroll to see the sights. The owner Joyce is great and personally involves herself with all her guests. She treats you like someone other than a guest. Now for those that ride motorcycle the plus sides are of course Joyce is a biker herself and welcomes us with open arms and knows we are not all trouble makers as some hotels make us out to be. The rates a good and the rooms are clean. The service can be trusted when you leave jewelry and money laying around. Not sure what else to say but see you next year Oceanic Motel. Jack aka Gamble VP CSWS

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!!!”
Reviews.Author: Nunez74
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great close to everything. The staff are really helpful. The owner is so lovely she's always making sure all the guest are having a good time. The view from the pier is amazing and close to all the shops on the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great place”
Reviews.Author: apierce88
Reviews.Content: My husband and I took a getaway to Ocean City, Md. We've both been there a couple of times during the on season, so this was our first time experiencing the off season. It was really relaxing, did a few activities and just relaxed. We wanted a nice place to stay near the boardwalk, but didn't want to pay top dollar price. We found our place when we booked a room at this motel. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The rooms were cozy and comfortable. It was a small room, with pretty much your standard bedroom and bathroom. We were out during the day so it was a nice place to come back to in the evening. It was relaxing hearing the waves and got a great view of the bay. We would for sure come back again! :)

Reviews.Title: “Yes, again!”
Reviews.Author: CyandSue
Reviews.Content: And again and again. We have stayed here numbers of times. Always greated warmly by Joyce, Angie and staff. The location is great! The bordwalk and beach are within walking distance and if you enjoy fishing this is the place to stay! The fishing pier is free when you stay at the Oceanic and that also is in walking distance. We vacationed here with friends and family and even made friends that also frequent the Oceanic. Great location and great staff, what more can we say? Looking forward to our next visit!

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: rennpat
Reviews.Content: The room was small and older furniture but clean and the staff was very friendly .The view of the bay was wonderful. Will stay there again and recommend it to friends looking for not expensive>

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: jmegabyte
Reviews.Content: Reserved a room via the internet, and was greeted warmly by the manager Joyce who got us into our room even prior to check in time. The staff was very helpful and the stay was very nice. Joyce went out of her way to make us feel welcome and we will stay here whenever we are in the area..... Thanks!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “If you want a place to sleep...”
Reviews.Author: butterflygirl423
Reviews.Content: if you want somewhere just to sleep and shower then this is where u should stay. The staff was friendly the room was clean but very very small. it was fine just to sleep and shower for us. I would definatly go back especially for the value of the room and the great location!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: jburchett1972
Reviews.Content: First time we stayed here but we loved the location. It was in the heart of everything. The boardwalk was only a block or so away. The assortment of shops on this end of the boardwalk was great. I had my mother with me and she wasn't to crazy about alot of walking but we were close to everything we wanted to do and see. Staying bayside gave.

Reviews.Title: “WORST MOTEL EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE”
Reviews.Author: Dissapointed83
Reviews.Content: The only reason i gave it one star is because you cant give it zero stars. The motel room was totally dirty. This hotel seriously needs to be shut down bulldozed and turned into a parking lot or something. There were stains everywhere!!!! EVERYWHERE!!!. The sofa bed had a brown stain the size of a pizza on it. NO JOKE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xarfCFqsC_U Check it out. The other mattress had what was a yellow hardened substance on the mattress. FLIES were also everywhere. It came with a complementary fly swatter. Which came in handy. The bathroom had a gigantic yellow stain covering most of the floor. The TV was horrible not all of the channels worked and it was always fuzzy. The hotel staff was very rude and wouldnt help you at all. During our stay someone got robbed and we were in the office when they were trying to alert the staff. The staff member refused to get off the phone and help the customer. The only one who would say hi to you was the maintenance man who was nice. There is no excuse for anyone to stay at this hotel. Pay attention to the reviews because they are legitimate. Do not spend hard earned money on a ruined vacation at the oceanic motel. AND NO WIFI . . . DONT STAY HERE. WALLS ARNT THICK EITHER

Reviews.Title: “I stay here every year”
Reviews.Author: gina1217
Reviews.Content: I have been going to OC yearly for many years. The last 4 years we have stayed here. I find that the motel staff are very friendly and helpful, The pool is very nice and clean. Some of the rooms are a little small, but never have I stayed here, that the rooms are dirty. It could use a little up dating, paint job and new carpet. The location is great, walking distance to everythindg. Free passes to the pier for fishing. If you want the Hilton , then you should pay for the Hilton. If you are looking for a nice little place to stay at the beach....This is the place

Reviews.Title: “needs updating/no parking”
Reviews.Author: gigi231
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Ocean City over memorial day weekend, we were 3 adults 2 children. We stayed in room 15 our room was small but we fit. The first problem was the living room tv would not stay on & in the middle of the night it would turn on on its own. Housekeeping did a good job cleaning our room except that the fitted sheets on the beds would not stay on the elastic was stretched we assumed that once she changed our sheets the problem would be resolved but it wasn't so we bascially kept waking up to fix the sheets. The other problem we had was that our bedroom windows faced the back of a restaurant which left 4 spot lighs on all night so our room was very bright and there were no curtains only blinds. The worst problem was we went out on a Saturday and when we returned there was no where to park, the entire lot was full when we complained we were told sorry but they rent jetskies on the weekends & they let the jetskiers use the parking lot.So here we were paying customers over a holiday weekend & they allow other people to park who did not pay to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to Visit”
Reviews.Author: pavacationgirl
Reviews.Content: Every year we stay at the Oceanic one of our friends told us about Oceanic 3 years ago we have been going every since . Its affordable the rooms are cleaned every day. Staff is very friendly. Nice view , close to the boardwalk , quiet, peaceful, easy access to fishing and free access to the fishing pier. M.Gatling Mount Joy, PA

Reviews.Title: “If a sterile cold hotel is what you want this is not the place”
Reviews.Author: YorkPaBeachnurse
Reviews.Content: Iam a return guest along with many otheres at the Oceanic, it may not be new but it is where you want to be. If you love the beach and are there for the view and convience this is the place. A short distance to the boardwalk and the inlet and bay outside your door. I have stayed at many other hotels and have found them to be cold and sterile. The staff and management go out of their way to be friendly. The rooms may be small, but clean. Although it is far from new it has the friendly atmosphere that I do enjoy. So if you are looking for the jacuzzi, riding the elevator to the 10th floor and being ignored by the staff than this is not the place for you. And lucky for you there are a lot of those places to be found. If this is what you want from your visit to the beach than I hope to see you there and you can become one of the many return "Ocanic Family"

Reviews.Title: “Not bad...I'd go back”
Reviews.Author: pianogirl27
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to go to OC in the last minute but had a hard time finding a place to stay. We stumbled upon this motel late at night online and decided to take a chance even though we knew nothing about the place but had read reviews giving the place a 50/50 rating. We knew not to expect the Hilton. From the pictures we saw, we knew it would be an older hotel. The location is excellent!! The view is beautiful. We walked to the boardwalk which was not far and everything we needed was close by. We stayed in a room with one double bed. It was very small and what I mean by small, it was not easy to move around with two people. If you are an overweight person, this room would not be for you. The bathroom is very small as well. The room was clean and the maid service cleaned the second day we were there. (we were only there for two days). The bed was comfortable with ample pillows. The furniture and bathroom could be updated but other than that, everything worked well. We would have stayed longer if we could have. We would go back.

Reviews.Title: “UNBELIEVABLE”
Reviews.Author: freddybauer78
Reviews.Content: This vacation was for me, my wife and 3 children. I wish I would of have read these reviews before i booked this motel. I guess this was a big lesson learned. The room we had was considered a suite for $280 a night! We arrived at 12 pm and check-in was at 3pm which I completly understand that we were early but 99% of the time, they give you the room as long as its ready and clean. Me and my family went for a walk on the boardwalk for a few hours. Got back to the motel at 2:55 pm and the the lady behind the counter pushed the issue that the room wouldn't be ready till 3pm . 3:20 comes around and me and my family we still standing outside because the room was till not ready. the lady finally mentioned that it wasn't their faul, they were short staffed. We finally got in the room around 3:30 PM and this was the dirtiest room I had ever seen. The carpets were so dirty that I told my kids to keep their shoes on while in the room. I spent $ 250 on new sheets, pillows . The whole room was extremely small. The tv's sucked. The fridge stunk. There were stains all over the sofa. When we weren't sleeping, we coudn't stand to be in that room because of the bad condition of it. I finally got sick of the place and left and didnt bother asking for a refund because the people were so rude and unprofessional. This place did not accept pets and I was glad because my boxed would of had to sleep in their dirty floor. They get a 5 negative stars from me!!!!.PS who ever gives this motel a good review then I would hate to see how they're living. This motel need to be shut down!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, not priced right.”
Reviews.Author: cmedemaio
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and i decided to stay at the oceanic because it was in a great location and the price was reasonable. when we got there the view from our room was beautiful,HOWEVER; when we walked in we were hardly able to both walk freely. This hotel is not suitable for an overweight person, the room is too small. The best part was the view and the location, it really is minutes away from the boardwalk. I was also woken up by birds at 7am because they were eating minos on the bayside. Unfortunately the motel had gotten our reservations wrong and only had that we were stay 3 nights instead of 4, and when I asked if there were any other rooms available for that extra night i was told "no, i dont see anything" .. there was no apology in the mixup whatsoever. The staff was very nice though and we did get free passes to the fishing pier which is open 24 hours.

Reviews.Title: “Great for a weekend getaway”
Reviews.Author: vetnurse63
Reviews.Content: Ask for a room with the waterview and you're set! Great location right on the inlet. It was so nice to be able to walk to the beach and the boardwalk. The room is simple. We had a queen bed that was pretty comfy, really cold air conditioning, and everything was clean! Yes, the room is small and the bathroom is small, but it's fine when you're just looking for a place to stay. You're at the beach anyway...you should be spending most of your time out there and not at the hotel! The hotel staff was nice and very helpful. We had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Got our monies worth”
Reviews.Author: m0m2three
Reviews.Content: We go to Ocean City as a family in the early summer then I return in the fall for sunfest(with my sisters and best friend). With 3 children (and a friend in tow) we try to budget as much as possible. I would rather pay less for a motel and have more spending money to do the activities with my family. If you stay on the lower end a lot of the motels are more "economically priced" sometimes you run the risk of getting a "not so nice/clean" place. Just don't go there again. We have walked past and looked at the Oceanic several times and booked there this year. It fit the need we had. It was not dirty though it could use a little refreshing and updating. We had a good time. We liked the location, close to boardwalk. We had a 2yr old, 11yr old and 2- 15yr olds. We were close enough to the restaurants that we patornized and felt comfortable if the 2 older kids walked there. The pool was clean and large enough for our kids to swim and play freely. The 2yr old liked "digging" in the sand on the bay side. Enough of a beach for him. We did have a room that backed the Italiain rest., did hear the bottles. You always hear the garbage trucks no matter where you stay. The staff was friendly. The only complaint I really had was I asked for the playhouse to be cleaned out(senior week cups, beer cans and food was in it) and it was not done. We know going that time of the year it will be noisy because all of june is seniors. But we can live with a little noise, just grin and bear it.

Reviews.Title: “Dive of Filthy Dives I would be embarassed to be the owner”
Reviews.Author: CalamitusChris
Reviews.Content: This place was filthy not just dirty or worn. If you don't mind being woke up at 5:30 by trash trucks, and dont mind being woke up by the Italian resturant throwing glass bottles into the trash at midnight and the resturaunt staff being noisy in the alley then stay here! Hope you don't mind sharing your room/bed with Ants. I hope you don't mind having to wash all the dishes if you plan to stay. Don't mind a dark hallway with cigarette butts all over the place or the smell of fishermans bait reaking from the trash cans then this is the right place for you. The carpets only get vaccummed by hand pushed ancient old vaccummes. They offered to steam clean the carpet but I imagine they don't have a good steam cleaner and was not interested in smelling wet funk for days. I looked into other rooms they are small have ancient furnishings, half the lights don't work. One guest said they vaccummed their own carpet. If they had a bit of sense they would tile the floors, for what I paid for 4 days they could have tiled the "East Wing" which used to be 2 rooms with a shared bathroom. Did I mention the mold?? I also found electrical problems in the room. I would reccommend this place to someone I realy hated. NO internet either and their TV's sucked. You might catch something if you swim in their pool or don't wear flip flops in the shower. Signed "pissed off that I was ripped off!"

Reviews.Title: “awesome location, kind staff”
Reviews.Author: ilovethebeach99
Reviews.Content: i have stayed at oceanic motel multiple times and every time we have an amazing time. i would rather stay here than any other hotel on the blvd, and price isnt the only factor for the statement. yes the rooms are small and might not be spotless but you shouldnt be spending that much time in the room anyways. the location is unlike any other as well as the view. its steps from the boardwalk, ocean, and bay. it's worth the price and it's also awesome when its around 33 dollars on weekdays off season. the staff was more than helpful to us on more than one occasion. i love it there and will be returning when we can!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location!”
Reviews.Author: tinob68
Reviews.Content: We just stayed at the Oceanic last week August 18th. I was a bit sceptical because of the bad reviews, but my folks stayed there and we all love to fish so we gave it a try. We had a wonderful week, it is so close to everything no car needed. The beach the boardwalk the fishing peir and the excellent and clean pool overlooking the inlet is great very relaxing. The room is really what you pay for not dirty tho like some said but it is kinda small. Other than that is was fine. We stayed in fancy places before but you can not beat this location and it seems more secluded than the big fancy places right on the boardwalk facing the ocean. Check it out...we will definitly go back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as some have said”
Reviews.Author: mom-from-baltimore
Reviews.Content: My experience was good. Yes the room is small, Yes the bathroom is REALLY small, Yes it's not perfect...but it was clean and a good value for the area. The room was old, everything but the TV was old, but although showed wear (some spots, etc - thank god nothing gross!) it was obviously cleaned consistantly - I have had dirtier rooms in hotels twice the cost. The location is supurb and the staff was friendly. They have coffee and fruit ( Yea! not junkfood) for breakfast everyday and a paper if you want one. The pool was well maintained and comfortable. This is not the Hilton, it's like a typical old-time 50's(?) motel. My cost $129 (after all taxes etc) a night for a bayfront 1 double room. Other hotel/motel costs in area start at $159 (if you are lucky) and up - Hilton costs $350++ a night --- AND I was in a GREAT location right near the boardwalk, rides, games, beach, everything. BOTTOM LINE: Know what you are going to get is a very very small room in an old motel that is NOT new, but clean and you will be happy with your stay.

Reviews.Title: “we thought it was fine”
Reviews.Author: bellringer66
Reviews.Content: 2 double beds,a small sitting room, tv,microwave, fridge,first floor,although old furniture it was clean. THe view of the inlet with the boats all day was super. Sandy beach for kids, clean pool, great location, 1 block to boards. price reasonable, take a chance on it.

Reviews.Title: “Trust me- Go somewhere else!”
Reviews.Author: nurse2be09
Reviews.Content: Friends of ours told us that they have stayed here previous years, and it "wasn't that bad." We took their word, and booked a weekend there. When we got there, the lady gave our friends a room which was already occupied. Then ran around like a chicken with her head cut off trying to find the right key for their room. Gave them several keys to try... they finally got into their room. My husband and I were in for a real treat- I opened the door to our room, stepped one foot in the door, and walked right back out. I could barely breathe-it smelled so horrible of smoke. Which I had requested a non-smoking room. The lady Angie said, "Oh we will just spray." Like that would help keep the smell out of my clothes. I didn't want to spend the whole weekend smelling like an ashtray. She said she would upgrade my room for an extra $50 a night... Why should I have to pay? My husband & I spent the afternoon walking the boardwalk for another hotel. Our friends room wasn't all that bad-little bugs here and there- until Sunday when we were all hanging out, I went to use the bathroom and their sink was covered, I mean covered in ants. I was disgusted. Take my advice and stay somewhere a little better. This place was disgusting.

Reviews.Title: “bad news”
Reviews.Author: traveler136
Reviews.Content: This place is smelly, old dirty. I am very easy going and can tolorate alot. But wow...smoky, carpets dirty, shower so small that you cant turn around in it. The price is cheap, but I will never stay here again. I would rather spend $20 more a night and get a clean, nonsmelly room. Go some where else.

Reviews.Title: “Hit The Spot”
Reviews.Author: divenbanks
Reviews.Content: We always would fish at the fishing pier and look over at the motel and wonder why we just didnt stay there where it was so close to the pier. So last year we stayed there right above the office in this small room that had everything we needed. The view was so awesome up there on the balcony. Every morning we would go down to the office and get this fresh coffee and muffins. The bed was really comfortable, and we would fish and go to the board walk and just walk everywhere. The staff was like a family and it was very clean too. I will go there every year.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location at OC!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BeachBumwkids
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have stayed at this motel in the past two years! I am 36 and have two children therefore, I need my vacation to fit my budget. My husband and I love this motel -the room was nice and large (our cleaning lady, Beverly, was always friendly and courteous), the view was fantastic! We even saw the horses over on Assateague island and also some dolphins in the inlet! If you are a morning person, this is a great location. I am sad to hear that it may be torn, as I loved the view from the pool!! We will continue to patronize this place until the end. You do get what you pay for -if you want to stay in a condo, then you pay condo prices. My parents and my sister's family have stayed here as well and LOVE the place!!! It's cheap, clean, friendly staffed, great pool (I don't think it is small and was always empty when we wanted to swim AND OPEN LATE), great location, & near the pier and boat/jetski rental. You can see the amusements, the boardwalk is close, and the beach is right there as well. We look forward to booking our next stay there for 2008!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: PASUZ45
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Oceanic every year for Sunfest and at least one other weekend a year. Yes the room is very small and needs some upgrading, but for the price and location, you cannot beat it. The staff is nice and friendly and go out of their way to make your stay pleasant. If you want a 5 star motel then this is not the place for you. If you want a small room where you can watch all the boats coming in and out of the inlet and see gorgeous sunsets, that is within walking distance to the inlet and boardwalk, then give it a try. We will be going back this year.

Reviews.Title: “The bug”
Reviews.Author: paantie
Reviews.Content: it was the first time we stayed there the view was nice,that's about it.The coffee was free you could use it in your car for oil,the fruit was brown.You could sit on the toilet and bed and watch the bugs it was dirty the people working there were nasty the phone didn't work .You left to go for supper and came back no place to park They need to take the money and put in the place

Reviews.Title: “Always love the Oceanic!”
Reviews.Author: OCEANICBOATS
Reviews.Content: We book our stay by calling the Oceanic staff directly and request the exact same room every year for Sunfest. We have never had a bad experience at that motel/hotel and the staff have always been very helpful and very courteous. This year they even took responsibility for my husband's scooter so it could be charged each night and ready for the next day. You can't beat the location, view and ease of getting to whatever is going on in the Inlet. Yes Oceanic..........hope you are here for many years to come!!!!

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: mommomval2000
Reviews.Content: TERRIBLE.!!! Had 3 rooms reserved via the OC website. Put deposits down, Got there to check in, Confirmations in hand,,,only to find out NO ROOMS were left. HMMM how does this happen. Had to stay someplace else. Oceanic did NOTHING to ""compensate" for this problem. The excuse was, "they dont use the internet!" I found this inexcusable. and will never attempt to stay there again, or give them a good reference..

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: auntsRfun
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have ever stayed at the Oceanic. Yes the rooms are small, but it was very clean!! Yes it needs a little updating but you can't beat the location. You don't have to move your car, short walking distance to boardwalk, beach, and the bay. Pool was nice, the view in the early A.M. of boats going out was relaxing. Have stayed at worse places for more money. Will definately stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievable Deal!”
Reviews.Author: DJinMD
Reviews.Content: I found out about this hotel right here on Trip Advisor. Yes, there are a few negative reviews so I did an experiment. I checked reviews for some 4 and 5 star hotels I know of. They all had negative reviews. The few negative reviews on here of this hotel are based on unreasonable expectations. It is very naive to think that you will get a $400 room for $100. Frankly, I was expecting a dive. But my room was clean, the bed was comfortable, everything worked except the tv picture was not very good. The room had a fridge and I even had 4 pillows on my bed! Undoubtedly, it was the smallest hotel room I've ever been in (about 9 x 10) and the bathroom was 2 1/2 feet wide (I counted the 4 inch tiles) by about 7. If you're over 300 pounds, you may have trouble squeezing past the tiny sink to get into the tiny shower. The walls were thin - I did hear another t.v. when I woke up but it wasn't loud. I don't think it is a loud/party type of place--I pretty much just saw families. There are even several picnic tables outside that overlook the inlet, plus the several tables on the patio outside of my room. There was also a nice clean pool with lots of chairs around it. My room was only $96 and this is one block from the boardwalk on July 31! That price for a clean room and decent bed is great in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!!”
Reviews.Author: Jef49
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's old, and yes it's in need of updating! But for the money, it was clean and comfortable. If you need a place to stay for under $100.00 this is it!! If you can afford better, good luck, there are lots of places willing to take your money, but none with a better price, locations or staff!!

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad For the Money!!”
Reviews.Author: jf49
Reviews.Content: Small rooms, but clean and comfortable. Needs some updating but for a couple nights well worth the price. The location and service is great. Friendly staff. We stay here everytime we go to O.C. If you want luxury, forget it!! Go pay 2xs as much at another place! You get what you pay for!!

Reviews.Title: “Dirty...do Not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: ferry4
Reviews.Content: This hotel looks great from the website.... although there is a reason they don't show you the rooms! The rooms are so dirty you won't want to touch anything! The owners of this hotel should be terribly ashamed of themselves.... they have an awesome outdoor location ... but the hotel needs complete renovation. The bathrooms look like they are atleast 50 years old... the pipes leak, they smell and our floor was actually titled. Do not go by the pictures posted on this hotel's website..... go by the reviews and carefully read them all. The hotel is beyond dirty, our carpet was wet and had mildew on it. I am surprised that the health department allows the hotel to run. You would be better off sleeping almost anywhere else.... do NOT choose this one. This is one of the worst hotels I have ever been in..... and I go to Ocean City ever year. I asked for a refund as soon as I saw my room..... which is something I have never done before. WORST HOTEL in Ocean City..... shameful!! Filthy!! a total dump!

Reviews.Title: “Don't judge a book by it's cover.”
Reviews.Author: banksbejaye
Reviews.Content: I have been going to the Oceanic since I was a little girl. Yes, it is old and run down. But you can't beat being right there in the middle of everything. Plus to wake up early and get that view of the inlet is priceless. You can also stay up late and just sit outside of your room and watch the inlet. You can come and go to the boardwalk as you please, you dont have to wait on a shuddle or pay for parking. Just relax and take your time, because your room is right there. Plus you can walk to the beach. Watch the fishing boats go out in the morning and return in the evening with their catch. It is priceless. I love the Oceanic and will always stay there. I live in Florida, and if I could afford to move to the inlet of Ocean City I would.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, not so excellent room”
Reviews.Author: beachbunny98
Reviews.Content: We decided at the last second (literally) while we were staying in Rehoboth Beach for the week to switch off and go to OC for the weekend. I found the Oceanic's website and thought it looked really nice and the price wasn't all that bad either. When we arrived at the motel, we were extremely impressed with the location, since it's right on the inlet and right across the street from the beach and boardwalk. The service was incredible as well. You couldn't find a nicer bunch of people. THEN we saw our room. Very tiny. It was fairly clean though, with the exception of the bathroom, which looked like a scene straight out of "Psycho", no joke. The mirror was so high up that I had to stand on the toilet seat to brush my hair & do my make-up, etc. The room we stayed in was marked as "pool view", however, there was no view of the pool with all of the cars parked out front. The pool was nice, although very crowded with teens, arrogant college kids and small children at most times. They have a little private beach area on both sides of the motel, although the one on the fishing pier side is the nicer of the two. They also have worn, sun-beaten hammocks to lounge in, best at night and with a towel. Our housekeeper lady was VERY nice, and always made sure we had clean towels, etc. Another thing to mention about the rooms... our room had a little table in it, and also a pull-out sofa bed, plus a microwave and mini-fridge. The room was a bit hard to navigate in the dark, but overall, our stay was enjoyable. If we had to, we'd stay here again, mainly because of hospitality and location.

Reviews.Title: “Never ever again!”
Reviews.Author: cjoy824
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been visiting Ocean City for years, however this year we ended up deciding to go last minute. I scrambled to find a room on such a short notice. Via the Internet I discovered The Oceanic, it looked good on the web. The motel had a great location, rate and being pressed for a room I booked it. When we arrived we discovered a tiny room! (by tiny I mean 8 x 11) with a double bed and a bathroom about 3 x 9 with a shower that you couldn't even turn around in! The room was severely outdated and the carpet so gross that we laid towels on the floor or didn't take our shoes off. I actually lifted the sheets and mattress to check for bugs! The walls are very thin and we didn't feel comfortable leaving any valuables in the room we locked them in our car. We were shocked and very disappointed. However the week we were in Ocean City was one on the summers busiest and we were truly stuck! We would never recommend this place to anyone ever! Stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “You won't like it.”
Reviews.Author: Fupa
Reviews.Content: I took one look at the room, went to the desk and checked out. Worn out, run down, not clean. Needs updated. I don't mind old, I stay at alot of older hotels and don't have a problem with it. This place has just been "left go". It's sad because it is in a good location for people who like the boardwalk, the fishing pier, and the beach. I feel the price is too high for such an out of date place. I feel when you go on vacation you want to feel comfortable and relaxed. I would not have been able to enjoy my stay if I had to stay there. We found a much nicer, well maintained place to stay for a cheaper rate. It was an older hotel too, but clean and comfortable. I would not recommend the Oceanic.

Reviews.Title: “I'd Spend All Summer There If I Could”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have been going there for many years. The STAFF are VERY FRIENDLY and PLEASENT.Fishing off the pier is FUN. I love the pool. Lots to do so close by. GO AND ENJOY.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the Price”
Reviews.Author: oceancityfan1965
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Oceanic May 16-20th, for $34.00 a night. I was nicely surprised. The location is fantastic.The rooms are tiny, but very clean. The staff is wonderful. If you want to go to Ocean City and not spend alot of money on lodging this is the place to stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Oceanic Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 710 South Philadelphia Avenue, Ocean City, MD
